data.message:
*Takes a huge breath of fresh air*

I think I am now going to build a time machine so I can listen to the Slim Shady LP for the first time over and over.

If there is a Heaven, and I go there, every time I turn on the Slim Shady LP, I want to be excited. Excited like the first time hearing it. I want to laugh. I want to laugh uncontrollably until the part where he says "Tie a rope around my penis and jump from a tree", which is where I lose it, because Cum on Everybody is about to start playing.

Can I just have that? Is that such a huge request? It's not a billion. It's not even a chance to meet him. Just that feeling again.
